channel.title: [PI] simple recolors
channel.description:
ok for the life of me i cannot find the models for Infinity and Dark Bows..i just need the models for a simple recolor...not a whole new model. im wanting to make simple recolors of these items since i dont rly want to preload more models, if anyone can tell me the models for these i would greatly appreciate it, thanks much.
p.s. permission granted to flame for recolors

item.title: [PI] simple recolors
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

well i understand how to recolor, and the 2 items i want to recolor are both in the cache already and its 317. recoloring i have no problem with, its finding the models for the recolors :s

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] simple recolors
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“l0lc0pt3r, post:1, topic:403701”]ok for the life of me i cannot find the models for Infinity and Dark Bows…i just need the models for a simple recolor…not a whole new model. im wanting to make simple recolors of these items since i dont rly want to preload more models, if anyone can tell me the models for these i would greatly appreciate it, thanks much.

p.s. permission granted to flame for recolors[/quote]

The infinity set should already be in the cache (assuming the client is loading the 377+ cache). I believe there’s a tutorial somewhere about recoloring items.

Read full topic
